name: Generate a Tines Story visual
description:
Using a Tines Story export, create a DOT graph representation of the workflow for documentation, compliance, and sharing purposes.

tags: Administrative, Visualization, Graph, Compliance, Beginner,
icons: tines, ðŸŽ¨, ðŸ“Š
visibility: public

payload.result:
digraph {
  node [fontname = "Arial", shape="box3d"]
  <%for action in unpack_story.story.agents%>
  "<<unpack_story.story.agents[FORLOOP.index0].name>> [<<FORLOOP.index0>>]" <%if unpack_story.story.agents[FORLOOP.index0].type = "Agents::EventTransformationAgent"%>[color = "#F5A666"]<%elseif unpack_story.story.agents[FORLOOP.index0].type = "Agents::EmailAgent"%>[color = "#DF99FF"]<%elseif unpack_story.story.agents[FORLOOP.index0].type = "Agents::WebhookAgent"%>[color = "#00d6b2"]<%elseif unpack_story.story.agents[FORLOOP.index0].type = "Agents::HTTPRequestAgent"%>[color = "#52BFFF"]<%elseif unpack_story.story.agents[FORLOOP.index0].type = "Agents::IMAPAgent"%>[color = "#F48889"]<%elseif unpack_story.story.agents[FORLOOP.index0].type = "Agents::SendToStoryAgent"%>[color = "#777FFF"]<%elseif unpack_story.story.agents[FORLOOP.index0].type = "Agents::TriggerAgent"%>[color = "#6DD888"]<%endif%>
<%endfor%><%for link in unpack_story.story.links%>
  "<<unpack_story.story.agents[link.source].name>> [<<link.source>>]" -> "<<unpack_story.story.agents[link.receiver].name>> [<<link.receiver>>]"
<%endfor%>
}

options.subject: Dot Graph for <<unpack_story.story.name>>
options.body: Check the attachment! The contents of the file can be put into GraphViz Online or Edotor easily!

diagram_notes.content:
# Generate A Tines Story Visual

This Story will generate a DOT graph representation from a Tines Story export. The DOT graph can be used with Graphviz based tools and services such as [Graphviz Online](https://dreampuf.github.io/GraphvizOnline) and [Edotor](https://edotor.net/).

Utilize the [form](./form) to upload a Story export. Your DOT file will be emailed to you.

form.name: Generate a Tines Story visual Form

fields.name: Email
fields.description: Your Graphviz .dot file will be sent here.

form.success_message: Thank you for your submission. A dot file will be sent to your email.
